decision_conditions: Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the tree or reduce its amenity value. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work.
Please submit fire statement/plan. It is validation requirement.
